title: Add CC and BCC support to email toolbox
description:
Add CC and BCC support to both email scripts:
1. scripts/email/jmap.js - CC support added (--cc flag), needs BCC
2. scripts/email/graph.js - needs both CC and BCC
3. Update email skill documentation with new flags

JMAP CC is already partially done (--cc flag added). Need to:
- Add --bcc flag to jmap.js
- Add --cc and --bcc flags to graph.js
- Update SKILL.md usage docs

actions.note: Added --bcc to jmap.js, added --cc and --bcc to graph.js, updated SKILL.md docs
